snippet: Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal, who have faced each other in eight major finals, plan to team up as doubles partners next year during the inaugural Laver Cup....
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal, who have faced each other in eight major finals, plan to team up as doubles partners next year during the inaugural Laver Cup.

headline.print_headline: Dynamic Doubles Duo: Federer, Nadal to Team Up in Laver Cup
headline.main: Dynamic Doubles Duo: Federer, Nadal to Team Up in Laver Cup
